task.title: Logging in to the Data Collector Window
task.shortdesc: Log in to the Data Collector window to work with pipelines.

step.cmd: To access the Data Collector window, enter the host and port name for the Data Collector in the address bar of your browser, and press Enter.
step.info: By default, the host and port name are: localhost:8080
step.stepresult: The Data Collector login page displays.

step.cmd: Enter your user name and password and click Login:
step.info: The default login credentials are:User Name: Password:add default user name/password.
